AppSelectionBtn.description.eulerQuat: Euler to quaternions or vice versa
ChebyshevCFInputContainer.panel.infoPane:
The input should be a simple .txt file.

The file should consist of one or more points, each on its own line. Each point should be made up of three coordinates: x, y and z. These should be simple numbers.

Example:
41.3 11.2 17.1
24.2 33.1 19.8
9.1 5.4 12.9
InfoModal.label.startAndTargetDifferentL: Length of start and target system don't match!
StartScreen.paragraph.explanation: In the sidebar, you can see the different topics. When you click on them, you can find several apps to choose.
StartScreen.subheader.welcome: This website will help you to solve your mathematical problems.
